name: Home By Six
description:
Greg and Jenn are trying to get home in time for dinner, but their co-workers have other ideas! You play as these two exhausted willing to do anything to get home and have a nice meal. Fight your way through an office full of your needy and unpleasant co-workers, but watch out for their hot coffee!

Home by Six is a Classical Co-op Beat-em-up, inspired by TMNT and Double Dragon.

The Controls: WASD and Space for Jenn, and Arrow keys and Numpad 1 for Greg 

This is the second GameJam game from our team!

Made by: Benjamin Reedel, Cameron Woolley, Julian Ritter, Colby Musialek

Lead Programmers: Benjamin Reedel, Cameron Woolley

Art and Sound: Julian Ritter

Titlescreen and Moral Support: Colby Musialek
